findings.details: Added global scroll-padding-top to keep anchored headings visible under sticky header across breakpoints.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan of content/layouts revealed no http:// placeholders.
SEO tags, description, keywords, and Open Graph present across core layouts.
Post content typography and wrapping remain strong; scroll anchoring now more consistent on mobile.

recommendations: Run external link checker when network is available
Consider anchor-link UI affordance in posts with long sections
